verbose_text: In addition, it has been reported that the long-term inhibition of NO synthase by L-arginine analogues, such as N (omega)-nitro-l-arginine methyl ester (L-NAME), accelerates vascular senescence in vitro and systemic hypertension and arteriosclerosis in vivo.
evidence: NO synthase by L-arginine analogues, such as N(omega)-nitro-l-arginine methyl ester (L-NAME), accelerates vascular senescence
